content:
I remember we went to see a movie and grab dinner together on February 20th, just before they moved away. It was one of our last hangouts before they left, and it's a memory I cherish. I might include a photo from that day in the care package or write about it in the letter.
assistant: That's a wonderful memory to hold onto! Including a photo from that day or writing about it in the letter will surely bring a smile to your friend's face. It's great that you're holding onto those special moments, even as you navigate this new chapter in your friendship.

Speaking of new chapters, how's your experience been with the painting class you started taking on Wednesday evenings? Have you met any interesting people or made any connections there?
